sd_structure.discription: Is the standard diviation shared between variants, can take on values T for true or F for false

time_treatment.discription: Do we treat time as time from start of dataset, or time from variant introduction, can take on value D for dataset or V for variant

time_modeling.discription: How do we model time, can be L for linear, S for splines, or O for other

distribution.discription: Are we using Dirichlet-multinomial or multinomial for the distribution of the data, can be D for Dirichlet or M for mulinomial

spacial_correlation.discription: Does the model contain any spacial_correlation elements, can take on values of N for none, S for some, and M for much
